chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 13 has the following issue: I'd like to change the color from blue to pink. Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. We will refund the customer once the cancellation has been made. Kindly inform the customer to purchase a new pink phone. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have cancelled the order and refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
AS
